title: Nextstrain measurements sidecar for datasets
description: Typically produced by Augur and consumed by Auspice.

default_collection.description: Default collection to display. The value must be a `key` in one of the objects of the collections array. Optional -- if not provided, first collection will be displayed

collections.description: Collections of measurements and their configurations for display in Auspice. Order of the collections determines the order they are shown in the collections dropdown.

items.description: A single collection of related measurements and the collection's display config

key.description: The short name of the collection that is only used internally within Auspice. Each collection is expected to have a unique key.

title.description: The title to display in the collections dropdown and panel title. Optional -- if not provided, then `key` will be used

fields.description: Custom field order and display titles. Order of the fields determines the order they are shown in the measurement hover display. Optional -- if not provided, then the key of the field will be displayed in alphabetical order.

items.description: A single field of the measurements

key.description: The property name of the field within the measurement object

title.description: The display title for the field. Optional -- if not provided, then `key` will be used

groupings.description: The available group by fields for measurements. Order of the group by fields determines the order they are shown in the group by dropdown.

items.description: A single group by field for measurements

key.description: The property name of the group by field within the measurement object

order.description: A custom order of group by values to customize the display order of the subplots when using group by field

items.description: A single value of the group by field present in measurements

filters.description: The available filter options for measurements. Order of the filter options determines the order they are shown in the filter dropdown. Optional -- if not provided, then all fields will be available as filters.

items.description: The property name of the filter field within the measurement object

x_axis_label.description: The short label to display for the x-axis that describes the `value` of the measurements in a collection

thresholds.description: Numeric measurement thresholds to be displayed as solid grey lines across subplots. Optional -- if not provided, no threshold will be displayed.

threshold.description: DEPRECATED - A numeric measurement threshold to be displayed as a single grey line shared across subplots. Will be ignored if 'thresholds' is provided.

display_defaults.description: Default display options of the collection

group_by.description: Default group by field name that must be included as a group by option in the groupings array. Optional -- if not provided, first group by option will be used

measurements_display.description: Dictates how the measurements are displayed, either as the raw data points or as the means of values grouped by the tree color-by attribute

show_overall_mean.description: Should the overall mean per group be displayed by default?

show_threshold.description: Should the threshold line be displayed by default? Ignored if no threshold has been provided for collection

measurements.description: All measurements for a single collection

items.description: A single measurement for a sample and it's associated metadata. At least one of the metadata properties should be a group by option

strain.description: The name of the sample that matches the name of the sample within the tree

value.description: The numeric value of the measurement

additionalProperties.description: Metadata associated with the measurement. Only metadata properties included in the groupings config will be included in the group by dropdown, but all metadata properties will be available as a filter
